text: basic use case function. ’ll still need render README.Rmd regularly, keep README.md --date. devtools::build_readme() handy . case, don’t forget commit push resulting figure files, display GitHub CRAN.
code: library(animalsound) ## basic example code animal_sounds("dog", "woof") #> [1] "The dog goes woof!" animal_sounds("giraffe") #> [1] "The giraffe makes no sound."
